title: How to make red velvet cupcakes
ingredients: ['150g plain flour', '3 tablespoons cocoa powder', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '150g caster sugar', '60g unsalted butter, softened', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 egg, lightly whisked', '1/2 tablespoon pure vanilla extract', '175ml buttermilk', '1 to 3 tablespoons good quality red food colouring', '1/2 tablespoon distilled white vinegar']
